dialogue_history.content:
Analyze this financial news and estimate stock price movement probabilities.
Company: Apple Inc. (AAPL)
News Headline: Apple Stock Catches a Downgrade. Why This Analyst Isn’t Impressed.
News Content: Apple fails to inspire confidence, due in part to a ‘lukewarm’ reception of its AI, one analyst argues.

Continue reading

View comments

Next I will provide you some predictions of stock price movement probabilities by others in the previous rounds.
Note that others' predictions may indicate that they have some other information about the stock price. A high prediction may indicate that they have some positive information about the stock, while a low prediction may indicate that they have some megative information about the stock.
Also note that there are multiple rounds of precitions, demonstrating the trend of others' beliefs.
Please take these information into consideration when prediction the stock price movement probabilities.
Previous predictions:
Round: 0
Model: openai/gpt-4o-mini, Prediction of stock price rising: 0.25, Prediction of stock price falling: 0.75
Model: google/gemini-2.0-flash-001, Prediction of stock price rising: 0.3, Prediction of stock price falling: 0.7
Model: google/gemini-flash-1.5, Prediction of stock price rising: 0.45, Prediction of stock price falling: 0.45
Model: deepseek/deepseek-chat-v3-0324, Prediction of stock price rising: 0.2, Prediction of stock price falling: 0.8
Model: meta-llama/llama-4-scout, Prediction of stock price rising: 0.2, Prediction of stock price falling: 0.8
Model: meta-llama/llama-3.3-70b-instruct, Prediction of stock price rising: 0.3, Prediction of stock price falling: 0.7
Model: qwen/qwen-turbo, Prediction of stock price rising: 0.2, Prediction of stock price falling: 0.8


Now give your prediction about the probability of the stock price of the relevant company rising or falling. Format your response in JSON format and include the following information as follows: 
{ 
"reasoning": "[Summarize your analysis and reasoning process here]", 
"company_name": "[Company Name indicating the name of the company]", 
"company_symbol": "[Company Symbol indicating the stock symbol of the company]", 
"news_headline": "[News Headline indicating the provided financial news headline]", 
"probability_of_stock_price_rise": [The estimated probability (a number between 0 and 1) that the stock price will rise due to this news], 
"probability_of_stock_price_fall": [The estimated probability (a number between 0 and 1) that the stock price will fall due to this news], 
} 
Do not generate output that isn't in properly formatted JSON.

{
"reasoning": "The news headline indicates a downgrade of Apple's stock due to a 'lukewarm' reception of its AI, which suggests a negative sentiment towards the company. Additionally, the previous predictions from other models show a consistent trend of low probability of the stock price rising and high probability of it falling, ranging from 0.2 to 0.45 for a rise and 0.55 to 0.8 for a fall. Considering this information, I estimate that the probability of the stock price rising is lower than the probability of it falling. Given the negative news and the trend of previous predictions, I predict a lower probability of the stock price rising and a higher probability of it falling.",
"company_name": "Apple Inc.",
"company_symbol": "AAPL",
"news_headline": "Apple Stock Catches a Downgrade. Why This Analyst Isn’t Impressed.",
"probability_of_stock_price_rise": 0.25,
"probability_of_stock_price_fall": 0.75
}
